name.ja: サクリファイス・<ruby>Ｄ<rt>デモン</rt></ruby>・ロータス

text.en: You can Tribute this card; Special Summon 1 "Yubel" monster from your Deck. During your opponent's turn, when a monster effect is activated while you control a "Yubel" monster (Quick Effect): You can Tribute this card; that effect becomes "Destroy 1 "Yubel" monster on the field". During your End Phase, if you control "Yubel" and this card is in your GY: You can either add this card to your hand or Special Summon it. You can only use each effect of "Samsara Regenerating Lotus" once per turn.
